#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
using namespace std;

int main() {
  int t;
  long long n, k, m, ans;
  long double x, y, z;
  cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    cin >> n >> k >> m;
    x = (long double) n, y = (long double) k, z = (long double) m;

    ans = 0;
    while (x * y <= z) {
      ans += 1;
      y = y * k;
    }

    cout << ans << endl;
  }
}
